import React from 'react'; const Home = () => { return (

Welcome to Recharge 2025!

About Recharge

Recharge is the fun and informal fest with sports activities for the Hostel Students of BITS Pilani Dubai Campus. It brings together students from all hostels for friendly competition, camaraderie, and unforgettable experiences.

This website is your one-stop destination for all information regarding Recharge 2025. Check out the registration page to sign up for various sports events, and keep an eye on the fixtures page for upcoming matches!

Event Highlights

  • Multiple Sports Competitions
  • Inter-Hostel Championship
  • Exciting Prizes
  • Fun-filled Activities
  • Community Building

Important Dates

Registration Opens

September 1, 2024

Registration Closes

September 15, 2024

Event Starts

October 1, 2024

Event Ends

October 15, 2024

); }; export default Home;
